text:
hey there <!channel> - Not specifically for design instagram, but wondering if someone could help out. 

I'm going to be in a couple meetings for a bit. Hoping that someone could use whatever camera has been used for other photos above OR grab mine that's on my 4th floor desk to head into stone and take some shots of the session going on in there. 

Nothing specific, just capturing the feel of the room/process.
and you can even avoid sticky notes in the shots (if i recall correctly that was a criteria in designstagram)
